caption: Incredibly flavorful every single time I order from here. The staff and owner are really kind and helpful. Great addition to the neighborhood!
Hey its Noah Great Food was there last night with my uncle (Shaun) great food and we had a great time there!! Good job Ben.
This is the perfect casual Thai restaurant to have in the neighborhood! Much better than the other Thai places in crown heights. One of the nicest couples, definitely a place worth supporting!

They should not call themselves thai food. their flavours are so bland! I ask for spicy wings and they were sweet I ask for a side of hot sauce it was sweet they have all their flavours wrong Never eating at this place again I only ate there because misc Was closed for Christmas Eve
Great spot to get something when in a hurry. Their customer service is fast, rates are convenient, great character. Highly recommended
Very rude

We love eating out. Yesterday we  visited this magnificent restaurant which we didn’t know before. We spent a beautiful evening there with high-qulity meal and a well-trained stuff and a distinguished  cuisine. We  added this fine restaurant in our list  and we shall certainly go again very soon. We warmly recommend.
Order the pad see ew and steamed dumplings both were literally SO GOOD. I’m new to area and really wanted Thai. All the reviews are so true. The food here is bomb.

INCREDIBLE! My mom and I were in the mood for a Thai so we googled and found Ruammit Thai! We were totally not disappointed. The restaurant owner or manager was so gracious and friendly and informative. The food was scrumptious! Drunken noodles, top rated! And the curry coconut sauce with pineapples and vegetables were incredible. Vegetable potstickers, woah! All amazing. And he gave us a little bonus treat. Overall great experience and if it wasn’t for COVID, we would have enjoyed dining in but next time! The owner was even gracious enough to bring the food to the car. Phenomenal customer service. Phenomenal food. What’s not to love!? Wish we lived closer but we’ll def recommend to our friends and family.

Excellent Thai food! Their arrival in the neighborhood brought a much-needed boost to the quality of Thai food in the area. Still working on trying more menu items, but have really enjoyed the pad thai, thai iced tea, and the Massaman curry is so good!

This is one of our regular spots to eat and we've been coming since they opened.  The husband and wife owners are great and he is a really dedicated chef.  Their food is always a little more impressive than expected for the price.  Like really nice smoky flavor on the wok fried noodles and hand made dumplings and spring rolls with good fillings.  They had amazing specials and special appetizers on the sandwich board back when there was seating. We always get several of the appetizers on their regular menu: sticky wings, spring rolls, and ribs are some favorites. I can't recall an entree we didn't like but recent favorites are the Pad Gra Prow and Gang Dang (red curry). Oh and sometimes you get a sample size extra appetizer in your order!!
The customer service is always prompt, awesome ambience, helpful staff. Will come back again when I am here.
Hands down the BEST Thai we’ve had. So delicious.
This is one of the best Thai spots in the city. Hidden gem in Crown Heights. Thank you Chef Ben!

This site is my number one restaurant.  Of all restaurants I know I favor it most. I always suggests to my friends to go to that place. when  I want to go to a fair dinner, this restaurant comes instantly to my head. good and all sorts of  food and a large menu.professional staff, and great spirit. Also, the bill is reasonable. I recommend this spot with pleasure.

I went in wearing hoodie because I live on the next block and was having a bad hair day. As soon as I walked in the restaurant the bar tender kept asking if I’m postmate, am I picking up... I kept saying no. Then I said can I have a menu and a glass of water and ordered spicy basil fried rice. I was about to sit and she rang me up. I paid and went back to the table. She went to the back and never came out... meanwhile I’m waiting to order a drink.. She didn’t bother to ask if I was having the meal there or not. The chef finally brought the food out and I opened it up. Then he said if you’re having the food here you’re there’s a way to do it... you’re supposed to be given a table. I just told him I’ll leave and he didn’t bother to get me a drink or change the plating so I could stay. They are weird in there and restaurant is always empty. So much for wanting to give them a slaw and trying new restaurants in the neighborhood.  Btw I didn’t enjoy the food. It’s Katy and way too spicy.  Will not return.

Expensive, mediocre Thai food. I ordered a vegetable Tom Kha soup that I found very bland and with roughly cut chunks of raw vegetables in it. The soup was $6.50,  which is a higher price than I've paid anywhere else in the city. Pork Pad Thai was fine, with at least some seasoning and good flavors, but some of the noodles were clumped together and there were only a few pieces of pork. I wouldn't recommend and I'll likely not go back.
Would definitely recommend eating here. Awesome vibes, flavorful food, good service. Great work.
The food is soooo goooood. But it was uncomfortably cold in there. I will go back again though, the food was that good

This review is long overdue - I eat here often and have always had a good experience. Food is always prepared in a timely way, staff is very kind and welcoming, and you can't go wrong with the menu choices. My go-to are usually their green curry or pad king ruammit, but I've never been disappointed with any of the options. Not all neighborhood Thai places are created equal, but I'm happy to have this one nearby :)
Hands down best Thai food I’ve had outside of thailand!! My favorite spot. The owners are so warm and gracious. The pork dumplings are a must.
authentic Thai food. the best in New York.
One of my favorite places to eat. very good location, well organised, and very good service. Very good job!
I eat here a lot since I work close by. I love how their customer service is always good and they keep the spot clean regularly. Prices are affordable and they serve big portions.

Best food...eveeeer...I dont understand these negative ppl...who dont know delicious food... best Thai food...environment s clean and calm ..trust me I tried different  menus and are delicious and portions  are perfect...they r very charming  and they  make u feel comfortable...🤗🤗🤘🏽🤘🏽

The chicken pad thai was so watery and soggy that it was inedible. When I politely reached out to the business, they refused to take responsibility, issue me a refund or a new plate. Very disappointing.

I was a bit skeptical when I first was brought here....I haven't had good Thai food with that authentic taste and heat in the US that often.  Most of the time it's Americanized and the heat is downplayed.  Well this place has a bit of both....Authentic Thai flavors and heat as well as some Americanized dishes (like pineapples in curry?) . I don't know, is that a thing in Thailand?  Maybe in certain regions?  But it was still tasty.  I always judge a Thai restaurant based on their soups and their Pad Kee Mao.  Food: - Chicken Satay - this dish was okay....I was a bit disappointed that chicken breast was used and not chicken thigh.  So I didn't care much for me, but my friend really enjoyed it.  - Tom Kha - This was one of the highlights of the meal.  The soup was so flavorful!  Almost like the one I had in Thailand!  Amazing!  Loved each sip of the soup soooo much. Definitely get this if you want soup.  - Pad Kee Mao - Another amazing highlight of the meal.  It had the wok char flavor in this dish that takes the dish to the next level.  The heat was perfect, but also a bit too spicy, but still it was so flavorful and exactly how Pad Kee Mao should taste.  yummmm.  - Panang Curry - This was a bit awkward....the curry had pineapples in it!  I know pineapple is used to sweeten dishes and tenderize meats, but cook it in curry?  I don't know how I feel about that.  Well the curry itself was still tasty, so no complaints there.  Definitely coming back here to try other dishes and get the same dishes I enjoyed.  Worth the trip to brooklyn to check this place out!  Yummmm!!
This place is worth a try. They have big portions for affordable prices. Consistently neat and with fantastic atmosphere. Would recommend to others.
I've always enjoyed delicious Thai food in this small restaurant with attentive staff. The heat is just right for me and the flavors are authentic.
Friendly, clean environment. Fresh and delicious food served quickly. Pleasant experience will be back.
Greasy and tasteless

Pad Thai was fantastic. Not overly nutty or sweet, perfect with fresh squeezed lime on top. I had it with chicken, cooked perfectly. The staff was very friendly and welcoming. Price was fair. Will definitely return, do them a service and dine in, enjoyed best in house. I spoke to the chef and he seems to have a good love for the quality of his food.
Had the spicy green curry. It was great. The right amount of heat and spice.Went with family and everyone enjoyed their dish. Would definitely go again.
Food was ok need more season mango sticky rice was very good.
Got it for a friend haven't tried it yet
They make me a (simple) off menu dish every time and are always really nice about it. Delicious and quickly made. Great people
excellent service excellent food , we will be going back

I give two stars because the woman was very nice, but this is the worst pad thai I have ever had. Shrimp should have no tails to pick out and remove in a noodle meal. The noodles were slimy and the taste was not appealing. My boyfriend had the chicken pad thai and the pieces of chicken were tiny and virtually indistinguishable from the egg and his had an overdose of sprouts; so much so that there were more sprouts in his than noodles. I asked for no peanuts in mine and guess what it had...  I drove here, passing other Thai places because of all of the good reviews. I am not sure what these people are tasting, but i'll never go back there! Sorry. Yuck.
We are regulars in this small family run gem
It is Thai food ish. I would not recommend to a friend. Better options await you.

The food was delicious! I had the crispy chicken which comes with rice and soup. The food didn't take too long to be served and the waiter was really nice and attentive. My date and I were the only two in there on a Sunday. Idk how crowded it gets. They have about 7 tables, the place is kind of small. I would definitely come back.
Delicious!! Portions were good and the dishes savory!
Love this place! Favorite Thai restaurant in Crown Heights. Great food, service and ambience. Highly recommend.
Awesome!
Great food and friendly atmosphere
This is the best Thai around and the owner is super nice.  I come here all the time and also order takeout and delivery occasionally.  It's really good every time.
The guy who cooks the food was so rude. Need to hire more nice people at that place. O won’t eat what he wants, I’m paying for a service and they were so mean. I wouldn’t come back to that place.
Long wait for food but beside that it was good
The food taste as if I was back in Thailand. The staff are nice and friendly. The price is very good for the portions that are served.  Definitely my go to Thai food restaurant.
Excellent shrimp pad thai!
I've frequent this place on many occasions. And the food is always amazing the portions are always on point and the chai ice tea is to die for. Keep up the great work.

Love this place! The dishes at this restaurant come closest to the dishes I had in Thailand as far as flavor and Ive eaten at alot of Thai places in the city and they dont compare to this one. The food is well presented and delicious. The staff are also very friendly. I highly recommend that you eat here for authentic Thai food!  My favorites are the curry empanada, pan seared salmon with coconut black rice, pad see ew, and kao soi noodle soup (spicy🌶)
Best Thai food and very friendly staff. I love this place

Omg I Loveeeeeeeeeeeee the Pad See eww !! It was amazing , noodles soft and succulent.  Meat juicy and flavorful ! The drinks are to die for and the prices are super reasonable!!! My new favorite thai place in Brooklyn! Finally thank you !

-portions are small. -expensive, especially with these small portions. -ordered shrimp pad Thai and gave me chicken pad Thai instead. -stingy on meat.  Only a few pieces per order. -gave 1 fork and 1 spoon for 2 entrees ordered.  Not returning.
Greasy pad thai with more bean sprout than noodles.. ugh!
Food is great but the customer service needs major work.
Excellent .SIMPLY DELICIOUS and authentic
Awesome, friendly and on top of their game. It's a small gem in Brooklyn but when you enter you're just in a relaxing location.
It’s really nice place. Small & cozy :) and the service is great
The food was awesome! Soup and dumpling were kickass. Plus the music was great! I’ll be back jack!
Delicious! And contrary to previous reviews, I thought the Pad Thai was great! Would definitely recommend.

Once you enter the store, you are welcomed by a curtain which your not sure if you should just walk in or wait for an employee.(2stars)When you get behind the curtain, there is a very respectful employee, who asks for your number of party.(5stars) You are seated and one minute later, you are greeted with a glass of water and your menu.(5 stars) I ordered shrimp fried rice and I received it in less than 14 minutes.(4 stars) The rice was cooked perfectly(5stars), The egg was main part of the dish which is something that I was too pleased about(3stars), There was a carrot and cucumber salad at the side(5stars), The carrot in the actual meal was a little undercooked(3stars), and the shrimp was perfectly cooked(5stars)!. When I was done with my meal, I waited 5 minutes before asking for the bill and it was quickly handed to me(5stars). When I had gotten up to give the bill is saw they very beautiful rice plant that caught my eye(5 stars).  Thanks for the experience ! 4.5 stars  *Visit Here*

Back in October... Arrived after 12p for lunch on a Sunday and they were still closed, gate down and everything. They don't have delivery and I walked all the way there to fulfill a craving for nothing.
Authentic and amazing thai. The vegetables are done to perfection. The owner is an angel and the chef is a genius. The food can be extremely spicy but the resturant in accommodating.
Food was not as expected :(
Exceptional recipe for the pork belly soup. A blend of traditional and modern flavors, large portions.
More sprouts than noodle. Greasy pad thai with meager servings of chicken. Tasteless.
Really good food-- the pad kee mao, green curry, and larb are all excellent.
Tasty, spicy! Will go back
The food was DELICIOUS 😋, service was great, small space, good food. Guests was complementing the cooks before leaving. Will return soon.
Best Thai food in Brooklyn. If you want fresh, delicious, spicy Thai food then this is the place to be.
Really delicious Thai, clean, relaxing environment. Try the eggplant basil it's really tasty! Very kind staff
It's clean and the food was fantastic! The portions are great and affordable. I'm slightly in love with the food.

Chill place to grab dome decent Thai in Crown Heights. I ordered a few things, Fire Wings, Laab, Chive Dumplings, and Tom Yum Soup. I found the Wings a little too salty for me, the Dumplings a lot different, the Tom Yum a bit tarty, and the Laab just right.

Bad food. Bad service. The crispy pork was rubbery. The noodles were burnt and bland. One member of my party ordered her entree without broccoli. It came with broccoli and when we asked the waitress, she shrugged and said "it's already done." All around bad experience
BOMB AF FOOD!!! Great service and even better prices!!!
incredibly fresh & delicious green curry, pad thai, papaya salad, and yummy chicken wings! so thrilled for this new addition to the neighborhood!!! super sweet service & byob awesomeness.
amazing!! food is delicious and authentic. So excited to have real thai food in the neighborhood!!
Finally! Delicious. Great food,  great ambiance,  great people. I'll be back soon
This place is amazing, very much reccomend this restuarant. Best Thai restuarant with amazing service almost hotel quality. Especially the food, I would be there every week.
